assertion.label: Change Details
assertion.name: change_details
assertion.value: 'Summary & Recommendations' have been added to the supplementary information for this paper. A corrigendum also appears in this issue.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: LH, MC, CvE and PL are affiliated to a hospital that offers CF carrier screening on their website. SAM is affiliated to a genetics service that offers CF, SMA and FXS carrier screening on their website. The remaining authors declare no conflict of interest.

title: Responsible implementation of expanded carrier screening
